product_name: Royal Robbins Chill Out Cardigan Sweater - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cool summer evenings? Zip on the women's Royal Robbins Chill Out Cardigan Sweater and feel totally relaxed. Chill Out yarn is a blend of 60% cotton for soft breathability and 40% acrylic for light weight and fast drying. Front 2-way zipper lets you unzip the sweater a bit from the bottom if you want more mobility or sitting ease. Hood pulls on for coverage; ties secure it from breezes. Royal Robbins Chill Out Cardigan Sweater for women has alternating rib-knit and crochet pattern for visual interest. Closeout.
short_description: Cool summer evenings? Zip on the women's Royal Robbins Chill Out Cardigan Sweater and feel totally relaxed.
